search_results.title: Suvrat Raju
search_results.snippet: Suvrat Raju is an Indian physicist. He is known for his work on black holes. He was awarded the 2019 ICTP Prize and the 2022 Nishina Asia award.

search_results.title: Suvrat Raju
search_results.snippet: Education: PhD (Harvard, 2008). Research Interests. Suvrat Raju's research focuses on quantum gravity and quantum field theory.
